item.title: My quick Spiderman 3 review.
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Did Sam Raimi forget to take his pills? Venom = Cool Sandman = Cool Tobey Maguire's quivering bottom lip = Crap multiplied by every single audience member cringing from watching a grown man melt into dramatic goo. Tobey pretending he's a pimp/dance-a-thon = Crap Bruce Cambell = Badass
